text: Motion
Hi there, Producer!
Hi, Yuika──

...Wait. Weren't you supposed to head straight to
lessons today? What's up?

Well, I had some extra time to kill, and I just
remembered...
...that I have some ice cream in the fridge!

That's right! It's the one I bought!
I'll just eat it before I head back~
Motion
Wait a sec, Yuika... Don't tell me it's...
...the expensive-looking one in a cup?

Why yes! It's a new flavor too!
Does that you mean you saw the ad, Producer?

Don't you think it looks as delicious in person?
──Huh? Ahhhh?!

Ah, crap...!
I knew it...!

It's the one over there, wasn't it...?!
I ate it earlier... I'm so sorry...!
......I was dying to try it too...

I-I'm sure you were...!
And it's all my fault...!
......I even wrote my name on it...

Ack...!
I knew I should have checked...
......I even finally managed to buy it...
Eh?!
...I hardly ever see it in stores...

── !
I'll find another one for you! I promise...!
Motion
......I'm not too bothered by it, actually.
It's my fault! I'll be careful from now── on?
Yes?

Ahaha! What's with the mixed signals there?
Are you glad? Or did you want to scold me?
...Of course I'm glad, aren't I...?!

Heh, well sorry!
...But I'll say this, P-tan...

If you're falling for something like that, it makes one think that
you'll apologize without knowing the full story. Just a theory!
N-No, that's not true...!

You sure about that?
Care to take a closer look at yourself?

I am...!
I'm telling you! So you gotta believe me!
Fufu...
...Don't worry. I believe you!

You're as sincere as they come, Producer. Even with the
occasional slip-up, it doesn't mean you lack sincerity.
...So would you accept my sincere apology...?

No need, we're good!
Playing around with you is enough payback!

──that being said... be prepared to spoil me silly the next
time we hit the convenience store!
